title: If you are taken by law enforcement,under suspicion of D.W.I.and found NOT to be intoxicated why are you left on Blue Clay Rd. to fend for yourself?This is not a fair conclusion to a law enforcement officers blunder.At the least a ride back to your car is in order.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6695
